title: Create a Signing Configuration
description: Create a secure signing configuration that loads credentials from environment variables with fallback to local.properties.
hints: Use System.getenv() to read environment variables
Use Properties class to load from local.properties
Create a helper function to check both sources
Check if keystore file exists before using signing config

testCases.description: Signing config loads from environment or properties
testCases.expectedBehavior: Credentials are never hardcoded and loaded dynamically
